C

checkSets() - Method in class Lottery
a method that cross references a copy of the player number set and lottery number set it removes all the non-matching numbers from the copy player set then it stores the amount of numbers remaining in the matching_num variable

L

l - Variable in class Tester
 
lottery() - Method in class Lottery
a method that combines all the previous methods to actually run the lottery includes a ticket variable which allows for the price of the tickets to be subtracted from the total
Lottery - Class in Unnamed Package
A class that holds the methods resposible for creating the lottery and running the lottery Eliza 10/02/2024

lotteryNumbers(int) - Method in class Lottery
a method that randomly generates 6 numbers within the range and adds them to the lottery number set
lotteryRange() - Method in class Lottery
a method that takes in the user's inputted range and stores it in the variable max

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Tester
the main method holds commented code that can be used to test individual methods from the lottery class currently runs the menu method that runs the whole lottery
max - Variable in class Tester
a variable that holds the max number

a method that displays a starting menu to the player

P

a method that checks that the sets are being added and copied correctly and that the size of the matching set is being calculated correctly
Tester - Class in Unnamed Package
A class that runs tests on individual aspects of the lottery class, it also holds the main method Eliza 10/02/2024

W

a method that allows the player to enter the number of weeks they want to use the same player number
winnings() - Method in class Lottery
a method that uses the matching_num variable to tell how much winnings the player should get uses if and else if statements to achieve this
